talk.author: did:plc:zrbbun4iz23qttwhcusmav46
talk.utter: It's just so frustrating to see him get away with it, time and time again.

talk.author: did:plc:bpdxcivpu6hrb2aful2x2ng4
talk.utter:
For what crimes?

Lawfare, an illegal appointed special councilor, and no sentencing = innocent.

talk.author: did:plc:zrbbun4iz23qttwhcusmav46
talk.utter: Stop, just stop. if that was the case all sorts of lawyers would have come out of the woodwork.

talk.author: did:plc:zrbbun4iz23qttwhcusmav46
talk.utter: Stop, just stop. if that was the case all sorts of lawyers would have come out of the woodwork.

talk.author: did:plc:bpdxcivpu6hrb2aful2x2ng4
talk.utter:
How do you know they haven't? SCOTUS even agreed in an Amicus Brief that Smith had no authority to try these cases. He wasn't legally or constitutionally appointed.

Good thing they are being dismissed.

talk.author: did:plc:zrbbun4iz23qttwhcusmav46
talk.utter: I think they are on hold till his term ends. But you no nevermind he's your god and can do no wrong.
